messages.subject: Music Maker?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I ran across a  little instrument at the music store today called a Music Maker. It looks a little like a little harp that you hold in your lap and
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I ran across a little instrument at the music store today called a Music
Maker. It looks a little like a little harp that you hold in your lap and
pluck. It comes with sheets of music that slide under the strings and show you
where to pluck. I also found them online as "lap harps." I'm including a link to
one and I just was entranced by it. It looked like a fun thing for folks like
me who wish they were musically-talented. Anybody familiar with these?
<A HREF="http://www.outofthebluetoys.com/chilwoodzitl.html">Children's Music Maker (Lap Harp) Musical Instrument</A>

Amy Kagey
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">Free shipping on </A><A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">Usborne Books</A> !



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
